website_summaries.verdict: Expensive, but it looks sharp in your home or business with a brushed stainless steel finish.
pros: Includes a timer that you can set to run the warmer automatically
Designed to mount on the wall for convenience
Measures 32" x 24", so it's large enough to handle all sizes of towels and bathrobes or can warm multiple towels at once
cons: Must use a tricky hardwired installation

customer_reviews.title: ONLY HEATS A SMALL PART OF THE TOWEL! POOR DESIGN!
customer_reviews.text: Only the part of the towel that touches the bar gets heated, and the bars are thin, and only touch about 15-20% of a bath towel. The rest of the towel is cold to room temperature! HORRIBLE WASTE OF MONEY. Now we use it to dry clothes. This is a poor design. It either needs a LOT more bars, or needs to be solid; AND it needs to be larger. Positive reviews are fake news? I promise you this won't get a bath towel warm or not!
customer_reviews.author: read carefully

customer_reviews.title: No timer included
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived yesterday it took 45 minutes to install it works as described. A timer was not included as stated in ad, I had to run to HD and purchased a Honeywell timer to complete install.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Perez

customer_reviews.title: Defective Tube Assembly - Part Number B - PLEASE HELP LOCATE REPLACEMENT PART
customer_reviews.text: 2nd replacement and now are ready to install it. One of the items for installation is Defective - cannot locate someone from the seller to find out how to get a replacement for it - we do not need the entire item - just the part # 0005-57110-0002 - ANY SUGGESTIONS? Due to order date can't replace again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Kickert

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER 4 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: Paid $275.00 to have this towel bar installed...Stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.author: michael zerbato

customer_reviews.title: Returned it.
customer_reviews.text: I shipped this back. One of the white end caps came cracked, the white cord came stained with black marks, and the construction felt substandard.
customer_reviews.author: Julie R. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the quality of the towel warmer
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality of the towel warmer. Ordered it to dry towels between uses and it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie M

customer_reviews.title: Quit working
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in August 2018 when we remodeled our bathroom. LOVE having a warm towel....it died this week. Just quit heating. Pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: ssmith

customer_reviews.title: No timer included as described
customer_reviews.text: I recieved it today and there is no timer included
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: Great timer feature
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Warms towels nicely. Timer is not easy to set or program.
customer_reviews.author: dawn shodi

customer_reviews.title: Towel warmer looks good.
customer_reviews.text: The towel warmer looks good. It is not heavy duty but looks like good value for the price we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Kudzu Cove Cabins DGC Birding

customer_reviews.title: Strongly recommend for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to install, affordable, looks and work excellent.
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It did warm the towels nicely, but it takes a long time to warm up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Invest in a better one, these are just ok and don't get ...
customer_reviews.text: Invest in a better one, these are just ok and don't get your towels really warm. The Runtal towel warmer is the way to go but very expensive and worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. Bought the hard wired version with the programmable timer. The towel rail heats up quickly and gives out a lot of heat. Not the easiest thing to install yourself, I had no power available close by, but it was worth the effort. I found the best way was to secure one corner first in the position you chose, put it in place and mark the spots for the other 3 anchor points. Then remove, drill and fix.
customer_reviews.author: Steve W.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product I installed myself; timer included is designed to control lighting rather than a towel warmer, so I replaced it at my expense with a more convenient count-down type device with several time options including 1,2, and 4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Grasbefore

customer_reviews.title: Warms in One Spot Only
customer_reviews.text: Only warms the towel where the towel sits on the rack. Would like the whole towel warmed...very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Pierquet

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended towel warmer.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic addition to master bath and wife loves it....and so do I. Anyone reasonable do it your seller can install if they are comfortable working with electric and installing outlets. The brushed stainless looks great and complements other stainless fixtures. Product is very well made. The included timer works great but is not the easiest to program.
customer_reviews.author: bolt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install...Warms towel but was hoping for it to heat towel more..Not going to return will try and figure out if I am doing something wrong or a different way to pull towel through...
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: NOTHING MORE LUXURIOUS THAN GRABBING A WARM TOWEL AFTER A SHOWER!
customer_reviews.text: This towel warmer makes your bath seem like a spa! It dries towel and washcloths quickly. The best is getting out of the shower and grabbing a heated towel. One of life's little luxuries! Treat yourself! Get one.
customer_reviews.author: B.Rubble

customer_reviews.title: Good device, poor controls
customer_reviews.text: Everything about it is great except for programming the time on it. Amazing that it is so difficult! So, be prepared to run it manually unless you have an in-bathroom IT person (ours quit). Still, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Travis T Brown jr

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Addition to any Bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I hardwired this in rather than using the time. Very high quality and never had an issue. Its a very nice addition to any bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: PDL

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for less than 2 years. It has stopped working. Bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Davis

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it looks and warms my towels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... in NH - what can I say - I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I live in NH - what can I say - I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Grinly Grinch

customer_reviews.title: Description doesn't match picture
customer_reviews.text: Please note, the description doesn't match the picture. According to the description this is the hard-wire version, but the picture shows the plug-in version and when we placed the order, we received the plug-in version as well. Update: The vendor (Warmly Yours) handled this issue very quickly and courteously. BTW, I installed this product in another bathroom for over 2 years and it is working very well. So, the quality of the product is great and from this experience, their product support is also first class.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: so not a great match to my all polished chrome bathroom
customer_reviews.text: It is much less shiny than on the photo, so not a great match to my all polished chrome bathroom. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Ewaw

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: The towel warmer portion is as advertised. Warms up fairly quickly. Not all rails warm up to the same level. The mounts are plastic and I'm concerned about the long-term stability of them. Install myself. Not over difficult if you have available wire (I'm not an electrician). The install instructions were terrible. I would recommend going with a higher level and look for a warmer with a built in timer and metal wall mounts.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: ... and the hard wired honeywell switch / thermostat went bad.
customer_reviews.text: Had this unit for 18 months and the hard wired honeywell switch / thermostat went bad.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mullinix

customer_reviews.title: switch goes bad auickly
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and substantial but switch stopped working after 18 months; the warranty was only good if I disconnected the switch, mailed it in and then they would mail me a replacement. I hired an electrician for installation as that is way out of my skill set; did not want to have to pay an electrician to disconnect it so I could mail it in, then wait for it, and then pay an electrician to reinstallation. So I'm paying almost $70 after 1 1/2 years to buy a new switch. Our house is on the market so I can't have a gaping hole in the wall. Won't buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I don't like showering without it
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Works best with an automatic timer to heat towels at least 30 minutes before they are used, I turn off the timer 30 minutes after use to dry them. I also interlace the towels between each rail to get maximum contact between the rails and towels for a more uniform heating. There's nothing like getting out of the shower on a cold morning, grabbing a warm towel and covering your head in it. Cliff Richmond,VA
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. It's been installed for 2 years now and I had no problem with it. My bathroom feels warm pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: WarmlyYours 10-Bar Infinity Towel Warmer, Plug-in, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Plug-in"

Bring Spa-Like Luxury To Your Home

WarmlyYours brings spa-like luxury into any home with the Infinity Towel Warmer. Its elegant design uses 10 round bars with horizontal orientation to quickly and evenly distribute heat to warm and dry bath linens. Made with durable stainless steel, this low-profile towel warmer delivers high-quality performance and has enough space to accommodate 2 large towels or bathrobes at a time, making it ideal for medium to large bathrooms. The straight rods of this 10-bar towel warmer are cleverly arranged to help keep mildew and dampness at bay, allowing plenty of air flow and an even circulation of heat.

Plug-In Design Installs Easily

The plug-in model features a 6-foot long cord and plugs into any standard 120V outlet in your home, so no matter where you want your towels warmed up, the Infinity towel warmer is there for you. The Infinity Towel Warmer has a wall-mounted design that is easy to install and provides a cozy 150-watt output of heat. Towels and robes are safely and efficiently warmed with minimal wait times. This sleek towel warmer fits neatly into any bathroom and blends with a variety of decor, without exposed wiring for enhanced aesthetics and function.

Low-Maintenance Stainless Steel is High-Quality

The easy-to-clean construction of this stylish towel warmer by WarmlyYours is made with heavy-gauge stainless steel. The robust construction of the Infinity Towel Warmer is built to last and will endure the test of time and is backed by a 2-year manufacturer’s warranty.

WarmlyYours prides itself on offering the highest quality towel warmers for a variety of bathroom styles and has the ideal solution for any need. The Infinity Towel Warmer is especially well-suited for medium to large bathrooms and can dry and warm up to two towels at a time. The sturdy 10-bar arrangement of stainless steel rails provides optimal heat with a minimal contour. Wall mounting of this plug-in towel warmer is a simple and DIY-friendly project. 

The Infinity Towel Warmer is just one of many ways WarmlyYours promises to bring comfort and convenience into your home. WarmlyYours strives to make everyday luxury a reality in any home. 

"
feature_bullets: GENEROUS HEATED TOWEL 10-BAR DESIGN: The Infinity towel warmer rack uses 10 bar stainless steel bars to evenly distribute heat, warming up to 2 large towels or bathrobes. Please place no more than two (2) towels on the towel warmer at a time. Overloading the towel warmer may cause heat to become trapped and the unit to become too hot

WALLMOUNTABLE TOWEL RACK : This towel warmer rack is wall-mountable with a plug in option so you can get the convenience of wall mounted towel heater. The Infinity hangs beautifully in any bathroom conveniently plug this unit into a nearby outlet.
COVERED BY A 2-YEAR WARRANTY : The Infinity warm towel rack is covered by our manufacturer’s warranty for 2 years.
SUITED FOR MEDIUM TO LARGE BATHROOMS: The Infinity heated towel warmer rack is especially well-suited for medium to large bathrooms
2-YEAR WARRANTY: The Infinity is covered by our manufacturer’s warranty for peace of mind

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars85 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
